Specimen Type: Varies depending on the specific test (e.g., blood, serum, plasma, urine, etc.)
Purpose: To ensure consistent and accurate analytical processes that generate reliable laboratory results across multiple test methodologies.
Container: Appropriate specimen container as required for each specific test (e.g., blood collection tubes, urine cups, etc.)
Equipment: Refrigerators, freezers, water baths, ovens, heating blocks, incubators, and various analyzers
